resource.title: Treatment plan for glioblastoma multiforme
resource.description: Comprehensive treatment plan including Surgery, Chemotherapy, Radiation Therapy

resource.conclusion: Patient shows stable status for glioblastoma multiforme. Sakura Chen, a 46-year-old Asian female, was diagnosed with Stage IV glioblastoma multiforme. She underwent surgery for tumor resection followed by chemotherapy cycles and radiation therapy. Currently, she is stable and undergoing regular follow-up visits for symptom management and treatment response evaluation.
